caption:
Our Original Moisturiser isn’t just available in a 75ml tin - there’s also a 300ml pump bottle 🤩

Sleek and slender, it is great for the bathroom to share with the family - or for keeping all to yourself ✨ 

And the best bit? There is the equivalent of 4 tins of cream in this bottle - so it works out at as a 30% saving compared to buying individual tins 🥳

#OriginalSteamcream #SuperSizedSkincare #300mlBottle #BigBottle #steamcreamskincare #moisturiseandprotect #skincare #madeinjapan #makingskincaresimple #veganskincare #crueltyfreeskincare #veganUK
